roleset.name: appoint again
roleset.note: REAPPOINT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to appoint.01. (from reappoint.01-v)

example.text: Because Justice Rubin turned 76 on May 9 , he-1 is n't eligible to be reappointed *-1 to the bench at the end of the year .
example.arg: at the end of the year
